title: IndEn un kaiyinilE
sahitya:
IndEn un kaiyinilE anbuDanE IndEn un kaiyinilE ennai


anupallavi

  shAntA enaiyALum vEndA mahAshakti kAntA sharaNam sarvAtaryAmiyE ennai


caraNam    ninaippadellAm unadu ninaivAga nAn nEsippadellAm un tuNaiyAga punaivadellAm un pugazhAga
nAn purivadellAm pUjaniyAga tani aghandai illAmal anaivarum inidun aruL vazhiyE inburum paNikkennai
